website_summaries.verdict: Stands out from the majority of stainless steel offerings thanks to its choice of black, red, or white finish and vintage appearance.
pros: Features settings for bagels, defrosting, and reheating
Dual controls allow you to control each pair of slots independently
cons: Some users complain it doesn't toast evenly

customer_reviews.title: Good price, durable and looks great.  But-
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't toast one side of bread very well. Other side is fine. Need to remove toast and turn it around to get both sides done evenly,
customer_reviews.author: Dutiful Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Not The Best Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster does not toast well. The inner side is often burnt while the outer side is fine. After using several settings, one was found that didn't burn one side but the other side was barely toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Harlan

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE TOASTER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new toaster. I works perfect and the style is outstanding. Looks very old fashioned which I love. I am so sick of the name brand toasters that all look alike and are extremely expensive. This toaster is a winner!!!! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: GSD LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Great retro toaster.....
customer_reviews.text: Looks great....appears well made and after a few adjustments to the light/dark adjustment I am getting a consistently toasted piece of toast.....who knew it could be so easy.......the only problem...to me anyway...... is that the slots could be slightly longer.....many of the brands of bread I enjoy are longer than the slots so it requires a bit of squishing as it were.....the slots are definitely wide enough. Am glad I bought it and have already recommended it to my friends......not that they listen.....
customer_reviews.author: HavasuFlash

customer_reviews.title: Toasts unevenly
customer_reviews.text: Had higher expectations based on the positive reviews. However, I have to agree with the negatives. Although this a nice looking toaster, it doesn’t toast evenly. One side of the bread is cooked very well, the other side is almost raw as photographed. And no, bagel setting was not used. Ordered a replacement and second toaster did the same thing - cooked on one side, not so much on the other. Might be serious QC issues since a few reviewers had better experiences. Personally, I can not recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good Heavy Duty Steel Toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, I don't think that's possible. Fits wider bread, toasts bread more throughly, with 900 watts, than other cheaper toasters. No, both sides are not evenly toasted. But I flip bread over and toast for just a few seconds more and walla! Perfect toast. So glad I purchased this Artisan 2 slot toaster by Homeart!
customer_reviews.author: Bygrace

customer_reviews.title: Art is Function
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for that nice retro design piece to add a little flair to your counter, this is it. The Chrome and Red look brings to mind the old diners of the 50's. Overall a nice item just to look at, but it is a lovely functional toaster as well. So far, every piece of bread has come out evenly toasted. Cleanup is easy. The high rise slots have meant nothing has gotten stuck or required coaxing to get out on the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the presbyopia stop you
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is reading the buttons on the bottom and dials. But I’m over fifty and tall. If only car automobiles manufacturers had the sense to bring back design elements that were stylish, yet functional. Mechanical controls, when properly designed, yield far better tactile feedback than the electronics. How did we get to the point where a toaster is fun to use, yet cars are sterile, look-alike appliances?
customer_reviews.author: Down8ve

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as any toaster.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black one. It is shiny black with chrome, with two pull out trays for cleaning. As one reviewer said it toasts side of the bread darker then the other side. My other toaster did the same thing. I've never found a toaster or toaster oven that did perfect toast. One thing I think is important, if you have children please watch them because this toast is light weight and has a tendency to tip forward when you pull the handles down. Also the sides get hot. For my household this toaster is good. Plus it looks beautiful in the kitchen. My kitchen is a mix of grey and black. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Saltglass

customer_reviews.title: It does not toast evenly on both sides.
customer_reviews.text: It toasts dark on one side and very light on the other. We are very disapointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt J.

customer_reviews.title: Lame!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color (red) and vintage style of this toaster, but it has one job and it's pretty lousy at it. One side of the bread toasts perfectly while the other side is barely toasted. I have to flip the bread around to finish toasting it. It doesn't take long, but that's not the point. It's not a big enough deal to return toaster, but it's a big enough deal to gripe about it. Disappointed. Won't purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Rivette

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband found this model, as opposed to the Kitchenaid one I had found, to replace our 2-slot aging Kitchenaid. This toaster, for one, is not RED as described- is deep orange red...so it doesn't match up with our mixer. Two, it doesn't toast well. One side is barely toasting, while the other gets very toasted. Bagels, now, are the very opposite of how you've been accustomed to toasting them forever. I agree, the numbers on the dial are very small and a bit hard to read. So, are we stuck with it now, since it's been used a few times..? Pass on this one ladies and gents.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Toaster that Halfway Works
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking little toaster with that vintage look which matches all my other appliances. The problem is that it only works halfway! Whatever you are toasting will not stay down. I have to manually hold it down in order for it to toast! I would return it, but the box it came in is long gone.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ameller

customer_reviews.title: Not like other "reds".
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the other appliances in my kitchen are red. Normally ordering red appliances is ok. This toaster is more of an orange/red. It does not match any of the other reds in my kitchen and looks odd next to them. It works great and I do like it but, until it's needed I keep it out of sight in a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: loves2read

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Compact but with 4 wire slots, today shading is easily controlled by dial wick is true in its orientation. Valdes also toasted well. Either you like the toaster presentation motif or you don't... Simple.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey J. Putterbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Toasters have always stood out like an awkward sore thumb in my kitchen. I have even hidden them in the pantry just to avoid seeing them. Not this one. I have a farmhouse style kitchen which this toaster fits perfectly in and this baby has earned a spot on the counter. We love it. Toasts better than any we have ever had and very customizable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Used this toaster twice now and it does a nice job so far making toast. I have not used any of the other functions yet. The red color is more of a orange red which didn't go to well with my red coffee maker but I don't keep the toaster on the counter all of the time so its not that big of a deal. I would recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this the cutest flipping toaster but works absolutely incredible
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Parker

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY🍞🍞🍞
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this toaster. It looks beautiful however, the toasting function is terrible! A simple bagel set to a number 3 looks as though it has not been toasted it all when done. The elements barely glow. I tried setting it to a higher setting and it took at least 3x times longer than my regular toaster to get it slightly toasted. Very disappointing especially for the cost. I will not be purchasing another item from HOMEART off Amazon. From now on I will just stick with my Cuisinart.... it was cheap and works better than this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but toasting is pretty unpredictable. Bagel mode only toasts the outside of the bagel (inside will be completely raw). The dial is very difficult to read — anything higher than 4 will burn to a crisp. Looks pretty though
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It Toasts Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago, it works great! I ordered Black, the box pictured Red, bar code said Black..We needed a toaster! We have settings on 3 1/2 everything from toast to bagels pops up perfectly. Bagels do have to be placed with fronts to the outside of the toaster. It's is a lovely shade of Red..importantly it works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Toaster should toast bread on both sides.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks goes nicely with the red accents in our kitchen but it does not evenly toast the bread. One side will be almost burnt before the other side is even starting to brown. We have been very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jennie_dipaolo

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my father and he loves it so far. The 4 slice is large enough for a bagel and it toast well according to what is selected on the dial. Very easy to clean. Love the look of the toaster also.
customer_reviews.author: Hockeymom

customer_reviews.title: Toaster curse finally broken!!!
customer_reviews.text: Toaster curse finally broken! I have never seemed to be able to find a great toaster. No matter how much or how little I spend I end up with crap! This was so far has been amazing!!!! Easy to use and toasts evenly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: christine ellery

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Toasters looks awesome. First one they sent didn't work right. The two center elements were shorted out or something. The seller sent me a working replacement right away this one works great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TOASTER!!!
customer_reviews.text: For 2 people this toaster is great!!! We don't have to turn the bread, we only toast 2 pieces at a time, IF you toast multiple pieces you might have to turn bread, OR wait a few minutes between toastings.
customer_reviews.author: lroe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking but
customer_reviews.text: I find it does not evenly toast top to bottom. It seams to toast more the top half than the bottom. I have had uneven toast issues with my previous toasters and was hoping to get away from that with this fancy toaster and no luck. Other than that it does look very nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hartenstein

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and works great. Its very sturdy and I like the dials at the bottom of each one. Set to the middle is perfect for toast and a little more for bagels or frozen waffles.
customer_reviews.author: $$Big-Daddy$$

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mix of vintage and modern.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is B.E.A.U.T.I.F.U.L. The product picture does not do this any justice. The cream is a perfect vintage cream but has the workings of a modern toaster and the touches of modern stainless steel. Crumb tray is perfectly hidden in the back. And the button lights are a modern LED light. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Michael Van Sickle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Toasting quantity in less time for the family.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and sleek retro look. Easy to use dials. Now all my family has this toaster because it is a wonderful gift especially families that have multiple people trying to get going at same time. Love waffles toasted 4 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: A good toaster
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's pretty and of good quality. It makes good toast with two different darkness dials, so it's good for couples. Best toaster I've owned. I've used it for 3 months now and it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Craig fisher

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Got the red, haven't used it that many times yet but it works great. Received the white one instead of red at first and it's a beautiful color if you're having trouble deciding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually makes toast!
customer_reviews.text: I realize now the last two toasters I owned did not toast. This toaster does a great job and does not burn the toast. It it very well made and looks great in our kitchen. Now I will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lammey

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutesy toaster I’ve ever owned. The buttons light up when toasting and the vintage look fits in my kitchen. When I purchased the toaster I thought it was going to be white and didn’t realize it was going to be cream but love the color. It works great and toasts everything perfectly according to the settings.
customer_reviews.author: VFern

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 10yr old toaster and within 2 months this one decided that was it. Will not bother with this brand again....
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Yes! You want this toaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is am outstanding toaster! Not only is the design attractive (I got it in red and it’s wonderful) but it toasts evenly and perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Fraga

customer_reviews.title: Cooks perfect on a low setting
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster, I have to set it on a low setting to keep it from burning the toast. It is a beautiful toaster. I would purchase this toaster again.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley S.

customer_reviews.title: Vintage look but modern practical
customer_reviews.text: This toaster works very well - it toasts both sides of the bread and the settings are very accurate. I'm really glad I purchased it. I was attracted by the look but am so very happy at the practicality!
customer_reviews.author: Beaucat California

customer_reviews.title: Can toast large slices!
customer_reviews.text: Room for oversize slices and the fattest bagel. Nice looking and very easy to use with all types of breads.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Francis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vintage looking toaster.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is beautiful. Had it a few weeks now and it gives my kitchen and the vintage look I was hoping for. The color is not pure white. It is more of a off-white/cream. The color doesn’t bother me and it isn’t all that noticeable in my white kitchen. Some of the reviews mentioned the toaster not toasting evenly but I have not experienced that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Madame Wickham

customer_reviews.title: A good toaster
customer_reviews.text: A good toaster. I like it. My family likes the way it works. I wish I had gotten the red one though. I guess there was a mix up.
customer_reviews.author: Merry Heart

customer_reviews.title: So many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool looking toaster. Everyone asks where i purchased it. Just beautiful in my kitchen. It works perfect, nothing has come out burnt,love having 4 slots for toast.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Cool Looking Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: It is so cool looking- just love it. Oh and did I mention it makes great toast?
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. O

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it is not actually white. It's more of a light creamy/beige white so it doesn't match my pure white cabinets quite like I expected, but I still love the over-all look.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Functions are true as advertised. Love the vintage look. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the toaster. I am happy with the design, color and functions. I definitely would recommend to anyone looking for a good quality toaster. The company is reliable and trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMicki

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. The White has just a tiny sparkly to it too so it looks sooo nice
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mena

customer_reviews.title: Very Stylish Kitchen Appliance
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a beautiful addition to my kitchen. It is quick and easy to use and the dials for each side give many options for the darkness of what you are toasting.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this toaster. It toasts ! I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hirschman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was given, by an old friend, a 1970's retro Kitchenaid Mixer in a cream color so wanted a toaster with the same vintage look. It arrived and much to my delight, it was the exact cream color as my mixer. Oh...and it's a great toaster, too.
customer_reviews.author: cgoodie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the counter. A heating element has already gone out, but it still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked the retro design and color red. It works well for toasting.
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: NO NOISE  IT JUST PLAIN TOASTS.
customer_reviews.text: I like the smooth lines of the toaster as it is earier to clean than one with grooves. The bread is toasted evenly and i especially like the fact that it doesn't make noise when you start to toast and when it is finished. Thank you for that. Paula 3316 Deer Lake Ct. Se Salem,Or. 97317
customer_reviews.author: Paula Radakovich

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toaster, till it was not.
customer_reviews.text: The toasting is even, with easy buttons. Minimal counter space. Update 5.13.20 The toaster fizzled out electrically. Now I have to watch the bread to make sure it is toasted enough and not burnt. I have to force the platform up in order to stop the toaster and dig for the bread. I will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the toaster for a couple of weeks - but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: It’s retro looking but so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful toaster! Everyone loves it! It toasts great and looks good! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Sokolik

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on the counter and works beautifully. The one drawback is that I thought it would have a little more weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Like the sparkly pearly white and shape of toaster. The knobs etc. are just ok.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster, works well and looks great. The only less than positive thing I would mention is that it is not weighted, so when you press down the levers, the toaster tilts.
customer_reviews.author: Camelia PAscu

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and retro in looks. I’ve had no issues with it and works perfectly. Highly recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Used for the first time last night to heat up some eggos. Cooked to perfection. Love the retro design and color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: good toaster
customer_reviews.text: we like the looks of it and it works good as well,
customer_reviews.author: hws

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking retro style toaster, and much cheaper than other retro look toasters like SMEG. Controls are easy and it works well. I also like that there are two sets of controls, as some 4 slice toasters only have 1.
customer_reviews.author: bob ambardar

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new toaster! Get compliments on the sleek look!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Shertza

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, a lot of options for your toast, and looks nice (:
customer_reviews.author: dorian

customer_reviews.title: Not the best toaster my old one worked better
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed in the toaster . I have the toaster set on 3 and I still have to toast twice because toast is so light
customer_reviews.author: Ron  LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love the style...retro feeling. Old meets modern fell. Blends in well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Darst

customer_reviews.title: Great looking toaster
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked it so much it is now a permanent feature on the counter. The old one was put in the cabinet after each use. It also does a great job on thick breads. easy to use and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Harrison

customer_reviews.title: very happy!
customer_reviews.text: great for a big family. after a month, it still toasts well and seems sturdy, as far as toasters go, while being attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Style and Function Meet
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Retro look at a great price. Perfect size and looks better in person than pictured which is a win win
customer_reviews.author: Joy A. Mase

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheaper option to match my cream colored Smeg coffee maker and this was it. Matches in color and retro style perfectly. Also, I like the looks of this toaster way better than the Smeg toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Belk

customer_reviews.title: I questioned this performance and was told that it was incorrect and a replacement unit was sent
customer_reviews.text: This would be the ideal toaster-that is, if it was working properly! The center heating eliments on the side walls barely light up - some not at all. This causes the bread to toast unevenly, some parts don’t toast at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality and service, super fast shipping and this vintage looks toaster looks pretty good in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Negron

customer_reviews.title: Looks adorable but def not the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: Toasts OK not easy to clean looks cute but def feels on the cheaper side
customer_reviews.author: acv

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOASTER
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase of this toaster. I have toasted regular bread and bagels in it and it comes out perfect every time. I also love the way it looks on my counter, very retro.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: After having a toaster oven take up space on countertops for years - this is our first toaster in 30 years! We love it! Toast, bagels, all good! Love the vintage vibe in our remodeled mid century kitchen :)
customer_reviews.author: Deborah T.

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, style, and size. Perfect for my kitchen and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my old toaster
customer_reviews.text: It takes two ties as long to toast as my old one did.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Heckelsberg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful piece on my kitchen counter! Works as well as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great looking toaster that does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Toasts well. Easily able to adjust the setting to get the results we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: gmjmro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: It is a work of art and exceeded our expectations. Love all the additional settings. We have received a number of compliments on its look.
customer_reviews.author: Lightening

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: I had been in the market for a new toaster for months and it seemed everything I found had plastic on it. I love how this looks in my kitchen and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: sharonaturko

customer_reviews.title: QUIT after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: One side didnt toast even on the darkest setting after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.author: L. H .

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: half of the toaster started humming when you pushed the toast down and pops it back up immediately. Love the style of this toaster but I am very unhappy that it didn't work more than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far.
customer_reviews.text: Toasted my wheat bread perfectly set at 2. Nice cherry red color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the retro look but the modern functionality. Performance on each setting is consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Registered Dietitian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: There are absolutely no quarrels, Mom loved it for Mothers Day!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beaulieu

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and it toasts perfectly. It's surprising how many toasters don't toast evenly or quickly
customer_reviews.author: Wannabeen

customer_reviews.title: slow toasting
customer_reviews.text: takes a long time for dark toast and has an uneven texture. darker at the top. seems well made, but needs some fine tuning.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Napoli

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother, she just redid her kitchen and was looking for a pop of color in red. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: brandinikki

customer_reviews.title: Compact, vintage, excellent toaster.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the nice shape of the toaster and that is compact. It works really well and the reheat button is nice to have. Not to mention the price! The quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vintage red tosster that is not only functional but cool looking!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the vintage vibe this toaster gives off. It has a cool red color that will make a perfct accent color in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Bender

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only had the toaster a couple of weeks, but so far it's been excellent. Easy controls, looks good and toasts evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cancel button feature, the different setting options and the slide out crumb tray on this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Parker

customer_reviews.title: New toaster easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Able to adjust settings to get perfectly toasted bread each time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Joines

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love the look and color of this toaster. I do not like a lot of items out on my counter, but this toaster looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Griebel

customer_reviews.title: Price is a good value for working people.
customer_reviews.text: Artisan Toaster is a wonderful product for single households, it easy to operate and clean!
customer_reviews.author: johnnie richmond

customer_reviews.title: Best Toaster Ever
customer_reviews.text: Cooks evenly on both sides every time. Easy to use and clean. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lowell Logan

customer_reviews.title: Its a toaster !
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I need in a toaster, works great , and looks good , simple mid century classy design with no flashing led lights .
customer_reviews.author: lerol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect retro look
customer_reviews.text: Great retro look, works great for toast and bagels, fine tune allows for perfect darkness of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fagone

customer_reviews.title: Good Toaster But Color just a little off
customer_reviews.text: Not as red as the picture, maybe a shade off, I thought it would match exactly other reds in kitchen (Wolf )oven knobs and Mixer
customer_reviews.author: John Barrett

product_meta.title: Homeart Artisan Toaster, 4 Slice, Black
feature_bullets: STYLISH TOASTER: This everyday toaster is designed with stylish retro details, brushed stainless steel housing, and comes in a variety of colors
4 SLICE DESIGN: Made for toasting 4 slices of bread
PERFECT TOAST: Designed with a self-centering function to ensure your bread and bagels are always perfectly toasted
